data.title: Limits of the Learning Curve
data.meta_description: Many companies have built successful marketing and production strategies around the learning curve—the simple but powerful concept that product costs decline systematically by a common percentage each time that volume doubles. The learning-curve relationship is important in planning because it means that increasing a company’s product volume and market share will also bring cost advantages […]
